title.rendered: The Maple Avenue Musical Club Presents Beauty And The Beast

content.rendered:
You are invited to attend the Maple Avenue Musical Club’s production of Beauty and the Beast. The show will take place in the Trombley Auditorium at Maple Avenue Middle School.

Show Times:

  • Friday, February 2 at 7 p.m.
  • Saturday, February 3 at 1 p.m. and 7 p.m.
  • Friday, February 9 at 7 p.m.
  • Saturday, February 10 at 1 p.m. and 7 p.m.

Tickets are $10 for adults and $5 for students and children.  Click here to purchase tickets.

Click here to view the virtual Beauty and the Beast Program.
